title: Optometry and Vision Science
job_description: College of Healthcare TechnologyWhy the American University of Iraq â Baghdad?Opening its doors in January of 2021, the new American University of Iraq â Baghdad (AUIB) began as a dream of influential individuals in Iraqi and the United States business, industry and government who want to see a world-class institution of higher learning established in the city, reminiscent of the days when Baghdad was an educational mecca and flourishing capital of the Muslim world.  With a great library, palatial college buildings and student centers, state-of-the-art classrooms, laboratories, and athletic facilities, AUIB will be a beautiful campus attracting students, faculty, and staff from throughout the world.  We invite you to join us in this exciting new venture.This position will report directly to Associate Vice President for Academic AffairsJob Description, Duties, And ResponsibilitiesTeach basic and advanced theoretical and laboratory courses for undergraduate and postgraduate Optics and Optometry students.Participate in designing modules and programs in novel optometry and opticianry sciences domains to reflect the latest developments in the field.Develop and lead multidisciplinary research collaborations in optometry, opticianry and ophthalmology leading to publications in reputed journals and establish an extramurally funded research programs that augment the research directions of the college.Contribute to development of pioneer testing and research facilities and laboratories in the College of Healthcare Technologies.Contribute to advancing optometry and vision science and medical imaging in the region through designing and delivering various continuous education (CE) programs.Be involved in assessment and committee work at the College and the UniversityHave strong commitment to continuous professional developmentQualificationsPhD degree from a reputed university with postdoctoral experience in Optometry or a closely related field.
